resources.string: New in 6.0.0\n * Modernisation to Android 6 (Marshmallow) bringing lots of new UI goodies.\n * Generally more consistent in usage and layout. * UI translations 99\% complete.\n * Cover thumbnails and log files moved to dedicated sub folders.\n * Configurable search-websites.\n * Better Anthology support (Edit/View/cross-book) and morphed into “Table of Content” or “TOC”\n * New Search website: ISFDB.\n * TOC auto populated (ISFDB site only!).\n * List of all works of an author.\n * Reformatting of titles configurable.\n * Language field shows the translated name in the current locale.\n * More Locale support in general (formatting etc.) * Books & Anthology/TOC titles now have a “first published” field.\n * Book Formats standardization.\n * Book Editions (1st, book-club, etc).\n * Book paid price.\n * Book date acquired.\n * Book pages is now alphanumeric\n * Currency support for prices.\n * Styles exported/imported in XML format.\n * Export of all tables can also be done in XML (no import yet).\n * Full support for rotating the screen.\n * External site id usage for direct identification & links.\n * Experimental: New Search website: OpenLibrary, KBNL\n * Removed: The old “Classic” view is gone.\n * Bug fixes\n
